content.question: Which of the following changes can be made so the method returns the intended value?

choices.label: Changing line 3 to  String[] revLetters = new String[letters.length - 1];
Changing line 4 to  for (int x = 0; x < letters.length - 1; x++)
Changing line 6 to  revLetters[x] = letters[letters.length - x - 1];
Changing line 6 to  letters[x] = revLetters[letters.length - x];

content.answer: Changing line 6 to  revLetters[x] = letters[letters.length - x - 1];
